name: Commodore Invaders
description:
A short game made for the "C= (Commodore) Logo Jam".

Fend off competitors such as the microprocessor MOS 6502 or the Z80.

WASD or Arrow keys for movement, Space bar for shooting.

Inspiration came from the market domination by Commodore over the Apple 2 and Atari 400/800 due to lower price and availability in retail stores.
